```{r}
rm(list=ls())
library('ggplot2')
library('rnaturalearth')
library('rnaturalearthdata')


metadata <- read.csv('data/correct_anal/location_ctrl.csv')

world <- ne_countries(scale = "medium", returnclass = "sf")
bci<- world[world$admin == "Barro Colorado Island", ]
panama <- world[world$admin == "Panama"]

ggplot() +
  # Add map background for Barro Colorado Island
  geom_sf(data = panama, fill = "gray90", color = "gray50") +
  # Add points for GPS coordinates
  geom_point(data = metadata, aes(x = LONG, y = LAT), color = "red", size = 3) +
  # Add text labels for locations
  geom_text(data = metadata, aes(x = LONG, y = LAT, label = site), vjust = 1.5, hjust = 0.5, size = 3) +
  # Customize plot appearance
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = "GPS Coordinates of sites within the ForestGEO 50ha Plot in Barro Colorado Island", x = "Longitude", y = "Latitude") +
  # Set the axis limits to zoom in on Panama
  coord_sf(xlim = c(min(metadata$LONG), max(metadata$LONG)), ylim = c(min(metadata$LAT), max(metadata$LAT)))

```
